onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} uses his magical powers to heal {Knight1}â€™s wounds. Unfortunately, the other members of the escort party were too far gone to be resuscitated. This act of kindness makes {Knight1} feel indebted to {Player}. When the two arrive at {Capital1}, they are welcomed by the guards and stationed in holding site by the name of {Site1}, to await further orders. {Knight1} later learns that {Player} was going to be taken away to a remote research facility within inner {Capital1}, known for cruel methods of experimentation. She pleads with her superiors to reconsider their decision, stating that she would not be alive without him, making an appeal to morality.

The {Kingdom#Adjective} high command, upon hearing about this, decides to give {Player} a chance to integrate into society. A few months later, {Player} was given the chance to be enrolled at the {Capital1} Military Academy, where young {Kingdom#Adjective} citizens learn to become fledgeling soldiers for their kingdom.
choices: {Player} accepts the offer to join the {Capital1} Academy
{Player} rejects the offer to join the {Capital1} Academy
